data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the Brim canal.
Slow flowing branching from the large lake, is the brim canal where dozens and dozens of brim fish call it home. The edges are lined with irregular rocks and lush green vegetation. Tall pine trees overlook the canal and lake making it a peaceful place to just go sick and watch the brim swim by.
There's a pine cone, a rock, a clothing, a lush green vegetation, a tree, and a fish here.
The person is here.

You are carrying a broken fishing pole and a weights, wearing a shirt and a cloth, and wielding a knife.

            "desc": "Slow flowing branching from the large lake, is the brim canal where dozens and dozens of brim fish call it home. The edges are lined with irregular rocks and lush green vegetation. Tall pine trees overlook the canal and lake making it a peaceful place to just go sick and watch the brim swim by.",
            "extra_desc": "The canal has been the preferred spot for the few local folk to come and gather water, wash some clothes, catch fish, and go swimming. In the canal there is no current like there is out in the main lake and there is shade by the trees on either side of the canal. The canal was formed thousands of years ago when a major earthquake made a rocky edge of the lake crack, allowing water to flow in and eventually separate the two sides even wider.",

data.short_motivation: I need to free my hands
data.mid_motivation: I want to show the person how to catch fish
data.long_motivation: I want the person to learn how to catch fish and fend for themself

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get broken fishing pole, weights, knife

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give lesson with broken pole to person

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get fish even with broken pole

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: follow person as they try to catch a fish on their own
